  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractSystem

      public AbstractSystem​(double strength, double maxRange, double minRange, java.lang.String name, Era era, java.lang.String internalKSPName)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      strength - double strength value of system for either defense or attack damage.
      maxRange - double maximal range of system.
      minRange - double minimal range of system.
      name - String name of the system.
      era - Era enum of era of the system.
      internalKSPName - internal KSP name to search by analyzer.
